trans-unit.source: All internal types and members should be declared with nullability annotations in InternalAPI.txt. This draws attention to API nullability changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.
trans-unit.target: All internal types and members should be declared with nullability annotations in InternalAPI.txt. This draws attention to API nullability changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.

trans-unit.source: Symbol '{0}' is missing nullability annotations in the declared API
trans-unit.target: Symbol '{0}' is missing nullability annotations in the declared API

trans-unit.source: Annotate nullability of internal types and members in the declared API
trans-unit.target: Annotate nullability of internal types and members in the declared API

trans-unit.source: All public types and members should be declared with nullability annotations in PublicAPI.txt. This draws attention to API nullability changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 PublicAPI.txt 中宣告所有公用類型與成員時，應提供可 NULL 性註釋。此動作會引起對程式碼檢閱與原始檔控制記錄中 API 可 NULL 性變更的注意，有助於避免發生中斷性變更。

trans-unit.source: Symbol '{0}' is missing nullability annotations in the declared API
trans-unit.target: 在宣告的 API 中，符號 '{0}' 缺少可為 Null 的註釋

trans-unit.source: Annotate nullability of public types and members in the declared API
trans-unit.target: 標註已宣告 API 中公用類型和成員的可 NULL 性

trans-unit.source: Symbol '{0}' violates the backcompat requirement: 'Do not add multiple overloads with optional parameters'. See '{1}' for details.
trans-unit.target: 符號 '{0}' 違反回溯相容性需求:「請勿新增具備選擇性參數的多項多載」。請參閱 '{1}' 以取得詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Do not add multiple public overloads with optional parameters
trans-unit.target: 無法新增多個具有選擇性參數的公用多載

trans-unit.source: All internal types and members should be declared in InternalAPI.txt. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.
trans-unit.target: All internal types and members should be declared in InternalAPI.txt. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.

trans-unit.target: Symbol '{0}' is not part of the declared API

trans-unit.target: Add internal types and members to the declared API

trans-unit.source: All public types and members should be declared in PublicAPI.txt. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.
trans-unit.target: 應在 PublicAPI.txt 中宣告所有公用類型與成員。此舉會讓您注意到程式碼檢閱與原始檔控制歷程記錄中的 API 變更，同時有助於避免發生中斷性變更。

trans-unit.target: Internal members should not use oblivious types

trans-unit.source: The solution must contain two files with the type "AdditionalFiles": PublicAPI.Unshipped.txt and PublicAPI.Shipped.txt. At least one of these files is missing or has the wrong type.

trans-unit.target: 缺少兩個公用 API 檔案的其中一個或兩者

trans-unit.source: When removing a internal type or member, put that entry in InternalAPI.Unshipped.txt with '*REMOVED*' prefix. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.
trans-unit.target: When removing a internal type or member, put that entry in InternalAPI.Unshipped.txt with '*REMOVED*' prefix. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.

trans-unit.target: Symbol '{0}' is part of the declared internal API, but is either not internal or could not be found

trans-unit.target: Remove deleted types and members from the declared internal API

trans-unit.source: When removing a public type or member, put that entry in PublicAPI.Unshipped.txt with '*REMOVED*' prefix. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.
trans-unit.target: When removing a public type or member, put that entry in PublicAPI.Unshipped.txt with '*REMOVED*' prefix. This draws attention to API changes in the code reviews and source control history, and helps prevent breaking changes.

trans-unit.target: Remove deleted types and members from the declared API

trans-unit.source: Symbol '{0}' is marked as removed but it isn't deleted in source code
trans-unit.target: 符號 '{0}' 標記為已移除，但未在原始程式碼中刪除

trans-unit.source: API is marked as removed but it exists in source code
trans-unit.target: API is marked as removed but it exists in source code

trans-unit.source: InternalAPI.txt files should have `#nullable enable` to track nullability information, or this diagnostic should be suppressed. With nullability enabled, InternalAPI.txt records which types are nullable (suffix `?` on type) or non-nullable (suffix `!`). It also tracks any API that is still using an oblivious reference type (prefix `~` on line).
trans-unit.target: InternalAPI.txt files should have `#nullable enable` to track nullability information, or this diagnostic should be suppressed. With nullability enabled, InternalAPI.txt records which types are nullable (suffix `?` on type) or non-nullable (suffix `!`). It also tracks any API that is still using an oblivious reference type (prefix `~` on line).

trans-unit.source: InternalAPI.txt is missing '#nullable enable', so the nullability annotations of API isn't recorded. It is recommended to enable this tracking.
trans-unit.target: InternalAPI.txt is missing '#nullable enable', so the nullability annotations of API isn't recorded. It is recommended to enable this tracking.

trans-unit.source: Enable tracking of nullability of reference types in the declared API
trans-unit.target: Enable tracking of nullability of reference types in the declared API

trans-unit.source: PublicAPI.txt files should have `#nullable enable` to track nullability information, or this diagnostic should be suppressed. With nullability enabled, PublicAPI.txt records which types are nullable (suffix `?` on type) or non-nullable (suffix `!`). It also tracks any API that is still using an oblivious reference type (prefix `~` on line).
trans-unit.target: PublicAPI.txt files should have `#nullable enable` to track nullability information, or this diagnostic should be suppressed. With nullability enabled, PublicAPI.txt records which types are nullable (suffix `?` on type) or non-nullable (suffix `!`). It also tracks any API that is still using an oblivious reference type (prefix `~` on line).

trans-unit.source: PublicAPI.txt is missing '#nullable enable', so the nullability annotations of API isn't recorded. It is recommended to enable this tracking.
trans-unit.target: PublicAPI.txt is missing '#nullable enable', so the nullability annotations of API isn't recorded. It is recommended to enable this tracking.

trans-unit.source: Enable tracking of nullability of reference types in the declared API
trans-unit.target: Enable tracking of nullability of reference types in the declared API
